About us
Luxury Hotel On Florida’s Emerald Coast
With a classic coastal design, the intimate WaterColor® Inn offers a relaxed beach house ambiance with all of the perks and amenities of a well-appointed boutique hotel. When you walk through our doors you instantly feel at home. It’s not just the broad strokes — the private beach, the stunning pools, gourmet restaurants and 500 acres of undisturbed seaside beauty — it’s the little details that make for special moments, like rooms with Adirondack chairs overlooking the Gulf of Mexico on your private balcony or the pebbled footpaths meandering through tranquil lakeside parks and gardens.
As a part of The St. Joe Company portfolio, our distinctive hotel property offers guests access to a host of amenities, including complimentary bicycle, kayak, and stand-up paddle board rentals, catered beach bonfires and much more.
General Manager:
Gabrielle Testa
Assistant General Manager:
Matt Moore
Director of Culinary:
Executive Chef Louis Martorano
Hotel Architect:
David Rockwell
Year Established:
2002
Location:
34 Goldenrod Circle, Santa Rosa Beach, FL 32459
Reservations:
Email Us
reservations@stjoe.com
or call toll-free
1-866-426-2656

About us
Luxury Hotel On Florida’s Emerald Coast
With a classic coastal design, the intimate WaterColor® Inn offers a relaxed beach house ambiance with all of the perks and amenities of a well-appointed boutique hotel. When you walk through our doors you instantly feel at home. It’s not just the broad strokes — the private beach, the stunning pools, gourmet restaurants and 500 acres of undisturbed seaside beauty — it’s the little details that make for special moments, like rooms with Adirondack chairs overlooking the Gulf of Mexico on your private balcony or the pebbled footpaths meandering through tranquil lakeside parks and gardens.
As a part of The St. Joe Company portfolio, our distinctive hotel property offers guests access to a host of amenities, including complimentary bicycle, kayak, and stand-up paddle board rentals, catered beach bonfires and much more.

Experience the Best of 30A
Special Year-Round Events
All WaterColor Events
Holiday Events
At WaterColor Inn, your stay is more than just a getaway—it's an opportunity to immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture of 30A, with a variety of exciting events happening year-round just steps from our doors. Located in the heart of 30A, WaterColor Inn puts you in the perfect position to experience everything the area has to offer, and after a day of event-going, you can return to your well-appointed room, unwind on the beach, or dine from a selection of restaurants, each offering a menu to suit every palate.

Book now
HARVEST WINE & FOOD FESTIVAL
October 16 - 19, 2025 | WaterColor®
The 9th Annual Harvest Wine & Food Festival by Destin Charity Wine Auction Foundation will provide patrons the opportunity to sip and savor some of the world’s finest wine and culinary selections while enjoying the iconic WaterColor beach town. Join fellow wine aficionados for four days of epicurean excellence.  Book your stay at WaterColor Inn and enjoy the convenient location and receive two tickets to the
Grand Tasting
event on Saturday, 10/18/25.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK PACKAGE
WATERCOLOR® MOUNTAINFILM ON TOUR
November 7-8, 2025 | WaterColor®
Celebrate the 25th Annual WaterColor Mountainfilm on Tour Festival  with two days of extraordinary films created to inspire courage, thought and empathy. Enjoy this eclectic mix of captivating films that enhances the bold imagery of these remarkable stories in an outdoor setting with a starry backdrop to enhance the unfolding clips of thought-provoking films.  Stay two nights or more at WaterColor Inn and receive tickets to both shows.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK PACKAGE
SEEING RED WINE FESTIVAL®
November 6 - 9, 2025 | Seaside®
The Seeing Red Wine Festival is a celebrated annual event featuring an array of wine tastings, culinary delights, and live music. Set in the charming town of Seaside®, this festival offers guests the opportunity to sample a wide selection of wines while enjoying the vibrant atmosphere of one of 30A’s most iconic beach towns.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NOW
ALYS BEACH CRAFTED
November 11-16, 2025 | Alys Beach
Alys Beach Crafted is an event designed to celebrate the collaboration of talents that enhance the 30A experience. Originating from the success of 2019’s Firkin Fête, this event focuses on showcasing crafted beverages, culinary experiences, artistry, and workmanship. Alys Beach will host a full linup of events, including Holiday Makers Market, Firkin Fête, Experiential Dinners, and the Spirited Soirée, where renowned craftspeople from across the country will share their skills and stories
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NO
W
30A 10K THANKSGIVING DAY RACE
November 27, 2025 | Rosemary Beach®
The 30A 10K, voted one of the top 10 turkey trots in the South, offers a flat, scenic route along 30A with views of South Walton's architecture and dune lakes. Runners of all ages can enjoy a DJ, local vendors, and a post-race celebration with breakfast, plus a complimentary Mimosa and Bloody Mary bar. Participants receive a commemorative race shirt and medal. With a 10K, 5K, and 1-mile run/walk, there's a race for everyone!
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NO
W
30A SONGWRITERS FESTIVAL
January 15-19, 2026 |
Festival Headquarters- WaterColor® | Performance @ Various South Walton Venues
Fans of great music are invited to enjoy the 17th Annual 30A Songwriters Festival over the four-day Martin Luther King Jr. holiday weekend. With an internationally prominent line-up of singer-songwriters and local artists, this festival is full of soulful melodies, powerful vocals, and compelling lyrics.  Book your stay at WaterColor Inn and enjoy more than 225+ performances from multiple venues along 30A.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NO
W
SEASIDE SCHOOL™ HALF MARATHON + 5K
February 13-15, 2026 |
Seaside®
Every year, athletes from around the world meet up in Seaside, Florida, for Northwest Florida's signature running event and paramount fundraisers for SEASIDE SCHOOL™, the oldest public charter school in Florida.  With lots of festivities throughout the weekend, including Taste of the Race, a culinary extravaganza celebrating local flavors and culinary maestors, to the Race Expo, the race is a great way to reach your running goals and spend time with your friends and families in one of the most iconic beach communities in the world.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NO
W
DIGITAL GRAFFITI FESTIVAL
May 2026 | Alys Beach
Experience the 19th Annual Digital Graffiti, a captivating outdoor art festival where digital artists project original works onto the striking white walls of Alys Beach, transforming the town into a vibrant, immersive gallery. This internationally celebrated event invites artists and audiences alike to explore the dynamic fusion of art, architecture, and technology under the stars.
LEARN MORE
|
BOOK NOW
Experience the Best of 30A
Special Year-Round Events
All WaterColor Events
Holiday Events
At WaterColor Inn, your stay is more than just a getaway—it's an opportunity to immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture of 30A, with a variety of exciting events happening year-round just steps from our doors. Located in the heart of 30A, WaterColor Inn puts you in the perfect position to experience everything the area has to offer, and after a day of event-going, you can return to your well-appointed room, unwind on the beach, or dine from a selection of restaurants, each offering a menu to suit every palate.

WaterColor Events
Fun Things To Do In Santa Rosa Beach, FL
WC Community Events
Holiday Events
With each unique event we host, WaterColor Inn welcomes guests to enjoy the vibrant culture, timeless charm and natural beauty of our beachfront surroundings. From seasonal events to engaging and interactive programs for guests and locals, there’s always something special to do.
*All events are subject to change and weather permitting; WaterColor Beach Club & Camp WaterColor are shared community amenities for WaterColor residents and guests of WaterColor Inn & Resort; it is not open to the general public; Gather Kitchen + Bar is a private amenity available only to WaterColor Inn hotel guests and Watersound Club Lifestyle members.
All Events
Filter by date
Clear dates
Filter by venue
Hotel/Area Events
WaterColor Beach Club
Camp WaterColor
Gather Kitchen & Bar
Fish Out of Water
Scratch Biscuit Kitchen
Happy Hour @Fish Out of Water
Daily (Year-Round) | 2- 4 PM
Every day is happy hour at Fish Out of Water!  Enjoy half-priced fresh RAW oysters, half-priced house wine, and a featured daily half-priced appetizer.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Bikes, Sights and Beers @Camp WaterColor
Every Tuesday (Year-Round) | 10 AM- 12 NOON
Bring your own bike, grab our Selfie Scavenger Hunt map at Camp WaterColor, and follow along on the self-guided tour through the WaterColor Community. Along the way, stope at the designated areas, take a selfie, finish the route, and return to The Canteen at Camp WC for a souvenir cup of beer (root beer for the kiddos)!
Live Music @Fish Out of Water
Every Friday (Year-Round) | 6 - 9 PM
Every Saturday (Mar. - Oct.)  | 11 AM – 1 PM
Every Sunday (Mar. - Oct.)  | 11 AM – 1 PM
Enjoy Live Entertainment on Friday Evenings and During Weekend Brunch!  Stay tuned in to our events page on Facebook for entertainment schedule; click on above links.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Happy Hour @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Daily (Year-Round) | 2– 5 PM
Gather for sunset and enjoy half-priced select beer, wine, and cocktails.  Sushi features available for purchase. Live entertainment begins at 3 PM, Monday- Thursday.
Live Music @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Tuesdays & Wednesdays | 3 - 6 PM (Year-Round)
Tuesday
|
Wednesday
Enjoy Live Entertainment from 3- 6 PM on Tuesday and Wednesday, as well as Happy Hour from 2- 5 PM every day!  Stay tuned in to our events page on Facebook for entertainment schedule; click on above links.
Live Music @WaterColor Beach Club
Every Thursday (Year-Round) | 5- 8 PM
Every Monday (March- August) | 2 - 5 PM
Every Tuesday (March - August) | 5- 8 PM
Enjoy live music on the pool deck, as well as a special Chef and drink features. Stay tuned in to our Facebook events pages for entertainment schedules; click on above links.
Weekly Specials @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Member Mondays:
50% OFF all menu items for our members.  Chef specials (4- 9 PM).
Tunes Tuesdays:
Live music from 3- 6 PM.
Wine Down Wednesdays:
Half-priced select wines all day.  Live Music (3-6 PM)
Trivia Thursdays
: Brain-teasing questions from 6- 8 PM (not available during holiday weeks)
Fish & Chip's Fridays:
Enjoy 50% Off our special featuring crispy, golden battered fish served with a side of perfectly seasoned chips beginning at 4 PM
Chef’s Weekend Brunch @Fish Out of Water
Saturdays and Sundays (Year-Round) | 8 AM – 2 PM
Enjoy your favorite traditional brunch items as well as seasonal specials, available for purchase at Fish Out of Water. Enjoy local artist performances
every Saturday
and a Jazz band
every Sunday
from 11 AM – 2 PM.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Trivia Night @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Every Other Thursday (Holidays excluded) | 6 - 8 PM
Join us every other Thursday for an entertaining trivia night filled with brain-teasing questions and a fun atmosphere.  Trivia is complimentary.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Jan. 9, 16, 23, 30 | Feb. 6, 13, 20, 27 | Mar. 6, 13, 20, 27
Apr. 3, 10, 17, 24 | May. 1, 8, 15, 22 | Jun. 5, 12, 19, 26
Jul. 10, 17, 24, 31 | Aug. 7, 14, 21, 28 | Sept. 4, 11, 18, 25
Oct. 2, 9, 23, 30 | Nov. 6, 13, 20 | Dec. 4, 11
Deep South Freeze Happy Hour @Camp WaterColor
Daily (February - October)  | 4- 5 PM
Enjoy BOGO Deep South Freeze ice cream treats and outdoor games including giant Jenga, cornhole, ring toss and hula hoops at The Canteen in Camp WaterColor.
Valentine’s Day- Be Mine Dinner @Fish Out of Water
Friday, February 14 | 4 - 9 PM
Join us for a romantic evening filled with love and culinary delights! Indulge in a
three-course meal
, paired with a bottle of our exclusive WaterColor™ private label wine. Live music by Evan Barber from 6-9 PM.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Flamingle Spring Break Kick-Off Party @WaterColor Beach Club
Monday, March 10 | 10 AM – 5 PM
Join us for a vibrant, flamingo-themed Pink-Me-Up to kick off spring break in style! Our lively pool deck party offers drink specials for both adults and kids, plus games like limbo with prizes for the winners. Enjoy a cocktail demonstration and live music as you soak up the fun, pink-hued atmosphere. Don’t miss out on this unforgettable spring celebration
Happy Hour @Beach Cow
Daily (March- August) | 3- 4 PM
Take your picture with Dottie, our Beach Cow mascot, and enjoy half-off on all milkshakes and ice cream.
Tequila Tuesdays @Costa Chica
Every Tuesday (March - August) | All Day
Enjoy half-price tequila tasting flights or select tequila
La Vida LOCA @Costa Chica
Every Thursday (March - August) | 11 AM- 2 PM
Join us for a fiesta of flavor with nachos and fresh, savory toppings. It's a culinary celebration you won't want to miss! Cost is $14++ per person.
Pool Yoga @WaterColor Inn Pool
Every Wednesday (March- October)  | 9 - 10 AM
Join us every Wednesday morning for Yoga on the hotel pool deck. Yoga mats, towels and cold water will be provided by Gather Kitchen + Bar.
Registration required: WCFrontDesk@stjoe.com. Yoga class is complimentary. $15 fee only applies to no-show registrants.
National Beer Day Celebration
Monday, April 7 | 9 AM - Sunset
Enjoy a selection of local & unique brews all day long at WaterColor Beach Club! Featuring local Ft. Walton brewery,
Props Brewery
.
Pool Volleyball Tournament @WaterColor Inn Pool
Second Sunday every other month (April 13, June 8, August 10 & October 12) | 11 AM – 4 PM
Volleyball players of all ages are invited to showcase their skills in this exciting 3-part tournament! Teams can register in one of three age groups for a chance to compete: Group 1 – Kids 12 & under, Group 2 – Teens 13-18, and Group 3 – Adults 19 and up. Participation is complimentary, but registration is required. Each winning team will receive a prize!
Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
to register, or through the Watersound Club Member app.
Cuban Date Night @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Friday, May 9 | 6 – 8 PM
From his home to your plate, Executive Chef Leonel Velazquez invites you to experience the flavors of Cuba with a thoughtfully curated 4-course meal. Each dish is paired with handcrafted cocktails designed to enhance the experience.  Enjoy live entertainment as you savor this unique evening of Cuban-inspired cuisine and culture!
Reservations Required (email WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com or sign up through Watersound Club Member app). $80++ per person.
View event details
Biscuit Day Celebration @Scratch Biscuit Kitchen
Saturday, June 7 | 3 - 7 PM
Enjoy family fun with games, bounce house, face-painting, live music, and more:
•    10 cent Biscuit with honey Butter | All Day
•    FREE Coffee (Hot or Iced) | All Day
•    Face Painting | 3 - 5 PM
•    Live Music | 3 – 7 PM
Feeling competitive? Join us for Scratch's 2nd Annual Biscuit-Eating Contest!  Registration for both Adult and Youth (12 and under) categories will be open from 8 AM until 4:30 PM at Scratch Biscuit Kitchen on the day of the event. The contest begins promptly at 5 PM.  Each group of six contestants will receive approximately 20 biscuits and two cups (20 oz. each) of water, with five minutes on the clock to devour as many biscuits as humanly possible!  Winners receive a free Signature Scratch meal every week for a year, Mug Club membership and Scratch-branded mug, loaded Scratch swag bag and major bragging rights for a year.
View event details
Mother’s Day Brunch Buffet @Fish Out of Water
Sunday, May 11 | 8 AM – 2 PM
Treat mom to a
Mother’s Day Brunch Buffet
and enjoy a complimentary Mimosa and muffin to celebrate her special day. Enhance the experience with bottomless mimosas available for purchase, ensuring a truly enjoyable Mother’s Day celebration. Live jazz music by Ray Hitchell from 11 AM- 2 PM.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Memorial Day Salute @Camp WaterColor
May 24 -26 | 10:30 AM - Sunset
Celebrate an All-American Memorial Day with us! Enjoy patriotic food and drink specials all weekend long at Camp WaterColor.
Memorial Day Salute @WaterColor Beach Club
May 24 -26 | 9 AM - Sunset
Celebrate an All-American Memorial Day with us and enjoy
delicious bites from our grill station
all weekend long at WaterColor Beach Club.
Kickin' Off Summer with the Kiddos @Camp WaterColor & WaterColor Beach Club
Sunday, June 8 | 10:30 AM - Sunset
Today is all about the kiddos! Join us for games, music, and fun activities on the pool deck at Camp WaterColor and WaterColor Beach Club. Special children’s food & beverage features that are sure to please your little ones! (
Special carnival-theme will be presented at WaterColor Beach Club)
.
Cheers to Dad: Bourbon Street Fair @WaterColor Package Store
Friday, June 13 | 4 - 7 PM
It's the perfect way to kick off Father’s Day weekend! Enjoy live music by Brett Stafford Smith, complimentary bourbon tastings inside the store, and bourbon-inspired street bites served curbside. Try your luck “fishing” for a discount and reel in up to 50% off any bottle of bourbon—just in time to grab a great gift for Dad. Classic bourbon cocktails will also be available for purchase at our street-side bar.
View event details
Father's Day Celebration @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Sunday, June 15 | 11 AM - 9 PM
Let Dad kick back, watch the U.S. Open, and enjoy a complimentary beer. Want to take it up a notch? Sign up for our
Cooking and Cocktail Demonstration at 1 PM or 3 PM
for a fun, interactive experience perfect for the whole family! Executive Chef Louis Martorano will walk guests through the differences between baby back and St. Louis–style pork ribs, demonstrating a variety of rubs, mops, and smoking techniques. For the tasting, guests will enjoy St. Louis ribs that have been expertly slow-smoked for six hours to showcase the rich flavor and tenderness these methods can achieve. While Dad explores BBQ and cocktail-making, kids can join in the fun with their own non-alcoholic drink creations.
$30++ per adult | $15++ per child (ages 6–12). RSVP to
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
to secure your spot.
Father’s Day Prime Rib Special @Fish Out of Water
Sunday, June 15 | 4 - 10 PM
Join us for a special Father's Day dinner celebration and treat dad to prime rib, half-price draft beer, and quality family time.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Slip 'N Slide Extravaganza @Camp WaterColor
Friday, June 20 I 10 AM – 1 PM
It is the official start of summer! Join us at the Camp WaterColor Field for waterslides and popsicles!
Independence Day Celebration @WaterColor Beach Club
July 4- 6 | 9 AM - Sunset
Celebrate Independence Day with three days of festive fun! Enjoy a Chef’s Cookout on the pool deck featuring all your favorite summer bites, paired with refreshing patriotic drink specials available throughout the day. A live band will keep the energy high with music to set the holiday mood. On July 4th, make the evening extra special with nighttime beach chair rentals starting at 5:30 PM, available on a first-come, first-served basis. As you settle in to enjoy the fireworks display, visit the Tiki Bar for drinks under the stars. Celebrate the red, white, and blue with food, fun, and fireworks!
Independence Day Celebration @WaterColor Package Store
Friday, July 4th |Pick-up from 10 AM – 6 PM
Celebrate the red, white, and blue with the perfect beachside treat! Preorder
Fish Out of Water's Star-Spangled Picnic Meal
by July 2nd, and pick it up curbside in front of the WaterColor Package Store on July 4th, just in time for the fireworks show.  Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
or call (850)-534-5050 to place your order.
Bonus: Each picnic meal purchase enters you for a chance to win a brand-new rod and reel!
Fireworks on the Gulf @WaterColor Beach
Friday, July 4 | 8:30 PM
Don’t miss this spectacular show in the sky celebrating America’s Independence, featuring the largest fireworks show on 30A .  Special nighttime
WaterColor beach chair setups
will be available from 6- 9 PM for $40 per set and our Tiki Bar will be open during the Seaside fireworks display on July 4th.
Limited availability.
Dottie’s Birthday Bash! @Beach Cow
Thursday, July 10 | 11 AM - 7 PM
Join us for a moo-velous time for all ages as we wish a very happy birthday to Dottie, Beach Cow’s beloved mascot! Celebrate all day with exciting games, festive activities, and special features. Don't forget to snap a selfie with Dottie herself and let’s make it a birthday bash to remember—Moo Ya’ll!
We all Scream for Ice Cream @The Canteen
Friday, July 11 | 4 PM
Let's celebrate with interactive ice cream stations where kids can build and personalize their own Deep South Freeze ice cream treat....Two for One Specials! Come try our unique flavors and toppings while supplies last.
Immerse Yourself in Art with Estelle Studios @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Saturday (January 18, February 22, August 23, and September 27) | 5 PM
Elevate your creativity with a brush in one hand and a glass of wine in the other at Gather Kitchen + Bar’s exclusive art series, in partnership with Estelle Studios. Each class offers a fresh experience with a new art style to explore, complete with complimentary wine and light bites for all attendees.
$65++ per person (Limited to 20 guests). Registration required at WCISocialEvent@stjoe.com or through the Watersound Club Member app.
January 18: Textured Impasto Style Art Class
February 22: WaterColor Doodle Art Class
August 23: Palette Knife Art Class
September 27: Paint Pouring Art Class
Labor Day Celebration @WaterColor Beach Club
Sunday, August 31 | 9 AM - Sunset
Join us poolside for Hornitos Tequila Tasting and drink specials as well as live entertainment from DJ 30A.
Labor Day Sip N' Shop @WaterColor Retail Stores
Monday, September 1
Celebrate the long weekend with a festive day of shopping and fun! Visit the WaterColor Store, WaterColor Kids, and WaterColor Package Store for 20% OFF all purchases and uncover treasures like WaterColor-branded merchandise for the family, locally designed jewelry, stylish brand-name apparel, and more.  Enjoy live music, along with complimentary bubbles and ice pops, making it a memorable outing for everyone—including the kiddos! Don’t miss the chance to savor complimentary tastings of our private label WaterColor™ wines at the Package Store.
9/11- Day of Honor @Fish Out of Water
September 11 | 11 AM - 10 PM
Enjoy special Chef and beverage features at Fish Out of Water, as well as patriotic live music by Brett Stafford Smith from 5- 8 PM.  All active and retired military personnel, veterans, law enforcement officers and emergency service professionals (with proper ID) will receive 50% OFF all day!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Heroes' Stay & Play Package- Honoring our Nation's Finest
September 11- 13 | WaterColor Inn
This special offer is fully booked.
CLICK HERE
for more exciting offers.
Secure your spot for a patriotic Celebration at WaterColor Inn— an exclusive offer for our dedicated first responders, active and retired military personnel, veterans, law enforcement officers and emergency service professionals.  Book your stay between September 11 - 13, 2025, and receive a 50% discount on rooms, retail purchases, and dining across all WaterColor venues on September 11th.  Also, enjoy our Day of Honor event at Fish Out of Water on September 11th, featuring live music from 5-8 PM, special chef specials and beverage features, and 50% off all food and beverage purchases all day. It's our way of thanking you for your service and ensuring a memorable experience.
9th Annual Harvest Wine & Food Festival @Cerulean Park
October 16-19
Experience culinary excellence at the Harvest Wine & Food Festival presented by Destin Charity Wine Auction. With wine dinners, the Grand Tasting at WaterColor’s Cerulean Park, and more, it's the Southeast's premier event. Tickets and details for the 9th Annual Festival will be available in summer 2025 at
dcwaf.org/harvest-festival
.   For the ultimate comfort and convenience, book your stay at WaterColor Inn to enjoy this event!
2025 WaterColor Mountainfilm on Tour
November 7 - 8 | Gates Open 6 PM; Films Begin 7 PM | Marina Park Amphitheater
Mountainfilm on Tour presents an annual showcase of culturally rich, adventure-packed, and enlightening documentary short films. The selected films align with Mountainfilm's mission of exploring cultures, preserving environments, and promoting adventure. Set against a breathtaking outdoor amphitheater with a starry backdrop, this event offers a captivating experience with thought-provoking films from the renowned festival in Telluride. Stay at WaterColor Inn and enjoy weekend passes to the event!
Visit our
Event Page
for tickets and more information.
Thanksgiving Buffet @WaterColor LakeHouse
Thursday, November 27 | 10 AM - 2 PM
Enjoy a traditional Thanksgiving spread and all the classic trimmings. Join us for a celebration of gratitude with family and friends at our annual WaterColor Thanksgiving Buffet – a memorable culinary experience awaits!
Reservations Required: Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
.
Thanksgiving To-Go Family-Style Meal @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Thursday, November 27 | 10:30 AM – 4 PM
Enjoy turkey and all the trimmings (for 4-6 people) conveniently packaged by Gather Kitchen + Bar for pick-up and/or delivery within WaterColor for additional fee. Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
by November 25 to place order.
Thanksgiving Day @Fish Out of Water
November 27 | 11 AM - 9 PM
There’s not a better day than one with turkey and dressing. Thanksgiving featured plates are available all day for purchase, along with All-Day à la carte menu. Enjoy your day with family and let us do all the work for you!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Breakfast with Santa @Fish Out of Water
November 28 | 8 AM – 12 NOON
Kick off the holiday season with a magical morning! Join us for a delicious breakfast buffet alongside Santa himself. Snap a photo, share your wish list, and enjoy sweet treats for the kids. It's a festive family tradition you won’t want to miss!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Burn Off the Turkey
Friday, November 28 |  8 - 9 AM (Map Pick-Up)
Go the distance to burn off the bird! Pick up your map at WaterColor Beach Club between 9–10 AM, complete the route using your personal tracking app (Strava recommended), and submit a screenshot of your results to
WCBC@stjoe.com
by 2 PM. Prizes for top performances in the run and bike categories will be announced via email at sunset—because leftovers taste better guilt-free!
View event details
Old Florida Holiday & Winter Market @WaterColor Town Center
Saturday, November 29 | 3- 9 PM
Join us for a festive, family-friendly evening filled with twinkling lights in the park, falling snow, and photos with Santa. Experience the charm of horse-drawn carriage rides and explore a variety of delicious food trucks. Don’t miss the holiday tree lighting and other seasonal fun! This event is free and open to the public, making it the perfect way to kick off the holiday season with your loved ones.
Presented by WaterColor Community Association.
Holiday Breakfast Buffet @Fish Out of Water
December 24 - January 1 | 8 AM - 12 Noon
Take a break from the holiday hustle! From December 24th to January 1st, join us daily for our signature breakfast buffet loaded with all your favorites. Enjoy a bottomless mimosa and bloody mary bar, and soak in live jazz music from 11 AM to 2 PM on the weekend (Dec 27 & Dec 28). Let us handle the cooking so you can savor the season!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Christmas Eve Brunch @Fish Out of Water
Wednesday, December 24 | 8 AM – 2 PM
Celebrate Christmas Eve with a festive brunch featuring Christmas music and Chef specials (à la carte menu and kids’ menu also available). Each child will receive a complimentary cookie and decorating kit to take home for Santa. Don't miss a special appearance by Mrs. Claus and treat the kids to hot cocoa and cookies while enjoying a heartwarming reading of ‘Twas the Night Before Christmas.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis
Christmas Day Dinner @Fish Out of Water
Thursday, December 25 | 5 -9 PM
Join us for a memorable Christmas Day dinner, where festive cheer meets exceptional cuisine, and live music by Judson Buchanan from 6 – 9 PM, creates the perfect holiday ambiance. Enjoy chef-curated holiday features alongside our à la carte and kids’ menus, offering something special for everyone in the family.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Bubbles Sip N' Shop @WaterColor Package Store
Sunday, December 28 | 8 AM – 9 PM
Celebrate the season in sparkling style! Stop by for a complimentary bubble tasting (adults 21+) and homemade chocolate truffles, plus enjoy 25% OFF all wine and champagne bottle purchases all day. Live music from 3 - 6 PM makes this the perfect way to sip, shop, and savor the day!
New Year’s Eve Family Southern Fish Fry @Fish Out of Water
Wednesday, Dec. 31 | 5- 9 PM
The wait is over—2026 is here! Join us for a festive New Year’s Eve celebration with family and friends. Savor a Gulf specialty with our All-You-Can-Eat Fried Fish Celebration or choose from our à la carte menu. Each table will receive a complimentary Southern "caviar" black-eyed peas appetizer to start the evening. Enjoy live music by Zack Mannino from 6 – 9 PM, chef features, and a photo booth to capture all the fun. It’s the perfect way to ring in the new year!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
New Year's Day Brunch @Fish Out of Water
Tuesday, January 1, 2026 | 8 AM- 2 PM
Celebrate the first day of 2026! Indulge in a bountiful buffet featuring your favorite traditional brunch dishes alongside seasonal specialties. To make the occasion even more festive, each table will receive a complimentary bottle of Prosecco. Live music by Dustin Herring from 11 AM- 2 PM.  Celebrate the start of the new year in style!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
There are currently no scheduled events for the selected dates. Please revisit this page at a later time for updates.

WaterColor Events
Fun Things To Do In Santa Rosa Beach, FL
WC Community Events
Holiday Events
With each unique event we host, WaterColor Inn welcomes guests to enjoy the vibrant culture, timeless charm and natural beauty of our beachfront surroundings. From seasonal events to engaging and interactive programs for guests and locals, there’s always something special to do.
*All events are subject to change and weather permitting; WaterColor Beach Club & Camp WaterColor are shared community amenities for WaterColor residents and guests of WaterColor Inn & Resort; it is not open to the general public; Gather Kitchen + Bar is a private amenity available only to WaterColor Inn hotel guests and Watersound Club Lifestyle members.

Happy Hour @Fish Out of Water
Daily (Year-Round) | 2- 4 PM
Every day is happy hour at Fish Out of Water!  Enjoy half-priced fresh RAW oysters, half-priced house wine, and a featured daily half-priced appetizer.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Bikes, Sights and Beers @Camp WaterColor
Every Tuesday (Year-Round) | 10 AM- 12 NOON
Bring your own bike, grab our Selfie Scavenger Hunt map at Camp WaterColor, and follow along on the self-guided tour through the WaterColor Community. Along the way, stope at the designated areas, take a selfie, finish the route, and return to The Canteen at Camp WC for a souvenir cup of beer (root beer for the kiddos)!
Live Music @Fish Out of Water
Every Friday (Year-Round) | 6 - 9 PM
Every Saturday (Mar. - Oct.)  | 11 AM – 1 PM
Every Sunday (Mar. - Oct.)  | 11 AM – 1 PM
Enjoy Live Entertainment on Friday Evenings and During Weekend Brunch!  Stay tuned in to our events page on Facebook for entertainment schedule; click on above links.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Happy Hour @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Daily (Year-Round) | 2– 5 PM

Daily (February - October)  | 4- 5 PM

Valentine’s Day- Be Mine Dinner @Fish Out of Water
Friday, February 14 | 4 - 9 PM
Join us for a romantic evening filled with love and culinary delights! Indulge in a
three-course meal
, paired with a bottle of our exclusive WaterColor™ private label wine. Live music by Evan Barber from 6-9 PM.

Flamingle Spring Break Kick-Off Party @WaterColor Beach Club
Monday, March 10 | 10 AM – 5 PM
Join us for a vibrant, flamingo-themed Pink-Me-Up to kick off spring break in style! Our lively pool deck party offers drink specials for both adults and kids, plus games like limbo with prizes for the winners. Enjoy a cocktail demonstration and live music as you soak up the fun, pink-hued atmosphere. Don’t miss out on this unforgettable spring celebration

Tequila Tuesdays @Costa Chica
Every Tuesday (March - August) | All Day
Enjoy half-price tequila tasting flights or select tequila
La Vida LOCA @Costa Chica
Every Thursday (March - August) | 11 AM- 2 PM
Join us for a fiesta of flavor with nachos and fresh, savory toppings. It's a culinary celebration you won't want to miss! Cost is $14++ per person.
Pool Yoga @WaterColor Inn Pool
Every Wednesday (March- October)  | 9 - 10 AM
Join us every Wednesday morning for Yoga on the hotel pool deck. Yoga mats, towels and cold water will be provided by Gather Kitchen + Bar.
Registration required: WCFrontDesk@stjoe.com. Yoga class is complimentary. $15 fee only applies to no-show registrants.
National Beer Day Celebration
Monday, April 7 | 9 AM - Sunset
Enjoy a selection of local & unique brews all day long at WaterColor Beach Club! Featuring local Ft. Walton brewery,
Props Brewery
.
Pool Volleyball Tournament @WaterColor Inn Pool
Second Sunday every other month (April 13, June 8, August 10 & October 12) | 11 AM – 4 PM
Volleyball players of all ages are invited to showcase their skills in this exciting 3-part tournament! Teams can register in one of three age groups for a chance to compete: Group 1 – Kids 12 & under, Group 2 – Teens 13-18, and Group 3 – Adults 19 and up. Participation is complimentary, but registration is required. Each winning team will receive a prize!
Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
to register, or through the Watersound Club Member app.
Cuban Date Night @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Friday, May 9 | 6 – 8 PM
From his home to your plate, Executive Chef Leonel Velazquez invites you to experience the flavors of Cuba with a thoughtfully curated 4-course meal. Each dish is paired with handcrafted cocktails designed to enhance the experience.  Enjoy live entertainment as you savor this unique evening of Cuban-inspired cuisine and culture!
Reservations Required (email WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com or sign up through Watersound Club Member app). $80++ per person.
View event details
Biscuit Day Celebration @Scratch Biscuit Kitchen
Saturday, June 7 | 3 - 7 PM
Enjoy family fun with games, bounce house, face-painting, live music, and more:
•    10 cent Biscuit with honey Butter | All Day
•    FREE Coffee (Hot or Iced) | All Day
•    Face Painting | 3 - 5 PM
•    Live Music | 3 – 7 PM
Feeling competitive? Join us for Scratch's 2nd Annual Biscuit-Eating Contest!  Registration for both Adult and Youth (12 and under) categories will be open from 8 AM until 4:30 PM at Scratch Biscuit Kitchen on the day of the event. The contest begins promptly at 5 PM.  Each group of six contestants will receive approximately 20 biscuits and two cups (20 oz. each) of water, with five minutes on the clock to devour as many biscuits as humanly possible!  Winners receive a free Signature Scratch meal every week for a year, Mug Club membership and Scratch-branded mug, loaded Scratch swag bag and major bragging rights for a year.
View event details
Mother’s Day Brunch Buffet @Fish Out of Water
Sunday, May 11 | 8 AM – 2 PM
Treat mom to a
Mother’s Day Brunch Buffet
and enjoy a complimentary Mimosa and muffin to celebrate her special day. Enhance the experience with bottomless mimosas available for purchase, ensuring a truly enjoyable Mother’s Day celebration. Live jazz music by Ray Hitchell from 11 AM- 2 PM.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Memorial Day Salute @Camp WaterColor
May 24 -26 | 10:30 AM - Sunset
Celebrate an All-American Memorial Day with us! Enjoy patriotic food and drink specials all weekend long at Camp WaterColor.
Memorial Day Salute @WaterColor Beach Club
May 24 -26 | 9 AM - Sunset
Celebrate an All-American Memorial Day with us and enjoy
delicious bites from our grill station
all weekend long at WaterColor Beach Club.
Kickin' Off Summer with the Kiddos @Camp WaterColor & WaterColor Beach Club
Sunday, June 8 | 10:30 AM - Sunset
Today is all about the kiddos! Join us for games, music, and fun activities on the pool deck at Camp WaterColor and WaterColor Beach Club. Special children’s food & beverage features that are sure to please your little ones! (
Special carnival-theme will be presented at WaterColor Beach Club)
.
Cheers to Dad: Bourbon Street Fair @WaterColor Package Store
Friday, June 13 | 4 - 7 PM
It's the perfect way to kick off Father’s Day weekend! Enjoy live music by Brett Stafford Smith, complimentary bourbon tastings inside the store, and bourbon-inspired street bites served curbside. Try your luck “fishing” for a discount and reel in up to 50% off any bottle of bourbon—just in time to grab a great gift for Dad. Classic bourbon cocktails will also be available for purchase at our street-side bar.
View event details
Father's Day Celebration @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Sunday, June 15 | 11 AM - 9 PM
Let Dad kick back, watch the U.S. Open, and enjoy a complimentary beer. Want to take it up a notch? Sign up for our
Cooking and Cocktail Demonstration at 1 PM or 3 PM
for a fun, interactive experience perfect for the whole family! Executive Chef Louis Martorano will walk guests through the differences between baby back and St. Louis–style pork ribs, demonstrating a variety of rubs, mops, and smoking techniques. For the tasting, guests will enjoy St. Louis ribs that have been expertly slow-smoked for six hours to showcase the rich flavor and tenderness these methods can achieve. While Dad explores BBQ and cocktail-making, kids can join in the fun with their own non-alcoholic drink creations.
$30++ per adult | $15++ per child (ages 6–12). RSVP to
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
to secure your spot.
Father’s Day Prime Rib Special @Fish Out of Water
Sunday, June 15 | 4 - 10 PM
Join us for a special Father's Day dinner celebration and treat dad to prime rib, half-price draft beer, and quality family time.
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Slip 'N Slide Extravaganza @Camp WaterColor
Friday, June 20 I 10 AM – 1 PM
It is the official start of summer! Join us at the Camp WaterColor Field for waterslides and popsicles!
Independence Day Celebration @WaterColor Beach Club
July 4- 6 | 9 AM - Sunset
Celebrate Independence Day with three days of festive fun! Enjoy a Chef’s Cookout on the pool deck featuring all your favorite summer bites, paired with refreshing patriotic drink specials available throughout the day. A live band will keep the energy high with music to set the holiday mood. On July 4th, make the evening extra special with nighttime beach chair rentals starting at 5:30 PM, available on a first-come, first-served basis. As you settle in to enjoy the fireworks display, visit the Tiki Bar for drinks under the stars. Celebrate the red, white, and blue with food, fun, and fireworks!
Independence Day Celebration @WaterColor Package Store
Friday, July 4th |Pick-up from 10 AM – 6 PM
Celebrate the red, white, and blue with the perfect beachside treat! Preorder
Fish Out of Water's Star-Spangled Picnic Meal
by July 2nd, and pick it up curbside in front of the WaterColor Package Store on July 4th, just in time for the fireworks show.  Email
WCISocialEvents@stjoe.com
or call (850)-534-5050 to place your order.
Bonus: Each picnic meal purchase enters you for a chance to win a brand-new rod and reel!
Fireworks on the Gulf @WaterColor Beach
Friday, July 4 | 8:30 PM
Don’t miss this spectacular show in the sky celebrating America’s Independence, featuring the largest fireworks show on 30A .  Special nighttime
WaterColor beach chair setups
will be available from 6- 9 PM for $40 per set and our Tiki Bar will be open during the Seaside fireworks display on July 4th.
Limited availability.
Dottie’s Birthday Bash! @Beach Cow
Thursday, July 10 | 11 AM - 7 PM
Join us for a moo-velous time for all ages as we wish a very happy birthday to Dottie, Beach Cow’s beloved mascot! Celebrate all day with exciting games, festive activities, and special features. Don't forget to snap a selfie with Dottie herself and let’s make it a birthday bash to remember—Moo Ya’ll!
We all Scream for Ice Cream @The Canteen
Friday, July 11 | 4 PM
Let's celebrate with interactive ice cream stations where kids can build and personalize their own Deep South Freeze ice cream treat....Two for One Specials! Come try our unique flavors and toppings while supplies last.
Immerse Yourself in Art with Estelle Studios @Gather Kitchen + Bar
Saturday (January 18, February 22, August 23, and September 27) | 5 PM
Elevate your creativity with a brush in one hand and a glass of wine in the other at Gather Kitchen + Bar’s exclusive art series, in partnership with Estelle Studios. Each class offers a fresh experience with a new art style to explore, complete with complimentary wine and light bites for all attendees.
$65++ per person (Limited to 20 guests). Registration required at WCISocialEvent@stjoe.com or through the Watersound Club Member app.
January 18: Textured Impasto Style Art Class
February 22: WaterColor Doodle Art Class
August 23: Palette Knife Art Class
September 27: Paint Pouring Art Class
Labor Day Celebration @WaterColor Beach Club
Sunday, August 31 | 9 AM - Sunset
Join us poolside for Hornitos Tequila Tasting and drink specials as well as live entertainment from DJ 30A.
Labor Day Sip N' Shop @WaterColor Retail Stores
Monday, September 1
Celebrate the long weekend with a festive day of shopping and fun! Visit the WaterColor Store, WaterColor Kids, and WaterColor Package Store for 20% OFF all purchases and uncover treasures like WaterColor-branded merchandise for the family, locally designed jewelry, stylish brand-name apparel, and more.  Enjoy live music, along with complimentary bubbles and ice pops, making it a memorable outing for everyone—including the kiddos! Don’t miss the chance to savor complimentary tastings of our private label WaterColor™ wines at the Package Store.
9/11- Day of Honor @Fish Out of Water
September 11 | 11 AM - 10 PM
Enjoy special Chef and beverage features at Fish Out of Water, as well as patriotic live music by Brett Stafford Smith from 5- 8 PM.  All active and retired military personnel, veterans, law enforcement officers and emergency service professionals (with proper ID) will receive 50% OFF all day!
Reservations are not accepted; seating is offered on a first-come, first-served basis.
Heroes' Stay & Play Package- Honoring our Nation's Finest
September 11- 13 | WaterColor Inn
This special offer is fully booked.

for more exciting offers.
Secure your spot for a patriotic Celebration at WaterColor Inn— an exclusive offer for our dedicated first responders, active and retired military personnel, veterans, law enforcement officers and emergency service professionals.  Book your stay between September 11 - 13, 2025, and receive a 50% discount on rooms, retail purchases, and dining across all WaterColor venues on September 11th.  Also, enjoy our Day of Honor event at Fish Out of Water on September 11th, featuring live music from 5-8 PM, special chef specials and beverage features, and 50% off all food and beverage purchases all day. It's our way of thanking you for your service and ensuring a memorable experience.

WaterColor Inn Gift Cards
Give a loved one, friend or colleague a wonderful gift in the amount of your choice. WaterColor Inn gift cards may also be used at the following WaterColor Inn & Resort locations:  Fish Out of Water, Gather Kitchen + Bar, WaterColor Grill, Costa Chica, Beach Cow and The Canteen.
Visit our
WaterColor Package Store
, located on the lower level of Fish Out Water restaurant to arrange your gift card or call (850) 534- 5020 to purchase a gift card.
